p: How can we mobilize additional funding and overcome the theoretical and institutional lock-in to which climate finance remains hostage? Many proposals have been discussed over the last decade. At the 2019 Climate Action Summit, many proposals came in, including proposals of a carbon tax, phasing out fossil fuel subsidies, a financial transaction tax, and carbon pricing for international aviation and shipping. The EU is a strong advocate of imposing a levy on these last two sources, as their international emissions, about 2 GtC02e/year (UNEP 2020) are not covered in the NDCs.
